title: Firefighters Combating Intense Factory Blaze
description: This black-and-white photograph depicts a scene of a large factory fire with thick smoke billowing into the sky. Several firefighters are actively working to extinguish the flames using powerful streams of water. A fire truck is parked nearby, and silhouetted figures of additional personnel are visible against the backdrop of the burning structure.
images: /Users/harrison/scans/001/Vintage Police Firefighter B&W Glossy Photograph 8x10 Factory Fire/front.jpg
